name: Comfy room 3 min to T stop-easy access to Boston
summary: Room in 3 bedroom apartment-3 min to T stop (orange line) and bus hub. This room is available for visits for 28 days or longer. Easy access to Boston (10 min) and Cambridge. Comfortable bed for 1-2 people overlooking garden, fully equipped kitchen (dishwasher, disposal, microwave, toaster), and good size bathroom. Logan Airport 10 min drive, easy access to downtown. Cambridge, Harvard, MIT, Hult, Assembly Square shops and restaurants. It is conveniently located but exposed to traffic noise.
space: The house is easy to find. If you take public transportation, take orange line subway to Sullivan Square, go to the right, turn right and the it will be the second house around the corner. You will share dining room, fully equipped brand new kitchen with stove, microwave, and coffee maker, and brand new, clean bathroom with a tub and shower. Linen, towel, and all amenities will be provided. You will be able to lock your bedroom using the same pass code you receive for the front door (each guest has their own pass code). I ask everyone to keep personal belongings in your room, and common areas clean (no dishes in sink, etc)..

neighborhood_overview: The orange line T stop and bus hub is right around the corner. It is very convenience but it's busy, exposed to traffic noise. There is Dunkin Donuts 2 min walk, China House 3 min, Tavern-3 min, Taco Loco-10 min, Amigos Grocery store -10 min, Stop and Shop 7 min by Uber/Lyft, Trader Joe -7 min drive (1 stop on the T), Whole Food-10 min drive, Market Basket 10 min drive.
notes: There is no smoking and no pets allowed so don't worry if you have any pet allergies. I do not have parking space available for this apartment. There is 2 hours parking restriction on the street (across the street and a little to the right as you face the house) Mon-Frid 8am-6pm. Practically you would be fine parking there anytime after 4pm, overnight, and until 10 am the next day, and all day/night on weekends. DO NOT park right in front of the house where Resident Parking is indicated. There is also parking lot (Maffa Way Parking) next to the T stop (Sullivan Station) 3 min walk from the house. They charge $6/day, which is very good for Boston. You can easily find it on-line and probably make a reservation but they usually say that they almost always have spaces available. If you are taking a cab, tell the driver to go to Charlestown (the same address exists in downtown Boston so don't let the driver to take you there).
transit: Take orange line to downtown Boston (10 min) TD Garden (4 min), Assembly Row (restaurants, Trader Joe, stores, coffee shops)-3 min ride. Buses to Cambridge -stop right in front of the house.
access: The apartment has a keyless entry. There is a keypad on the front door (and your bedroom's door). You will just need to enter the code (I'll send it to you once you make the reservation) and you are in. You will see a staircase on your right. Go straight and you will see another door with key pad. Enter the same pass code and you are in your apartment. If you stay for more then 5 days, you will be able to use laundry (in basement). You will have a new, fully equipped kitchen with coffee/tea, condiments provided, and a new bathroom with shower/tub-shampoo, conditioner, body wash provided.
interaction: You will be able to reach me by Airbnb message (preferred), text, or phone. I will be happy to stop by to meet you, if you like, or I will leave you alone, if you prefer.
host_about: I'm a musician. I was born in Poland but I have been living in Boston for the last 25 years. I travelled extensively all over Europe and some other places around the world. My favorite destinations include Southern France, Croatia, and Cape Cod. I love swimming, hiking, biking, reading, and listening to jazz and classical music.

name: Close to Orange line, University, Downtown
summary: Do you wish to stay in a comfy&economic private room near Cambridge? It’s historical and convenient location to stay in the house. You could find small market, restaurants, bars, grocery store, laundry store nearby the house in a few blocks away. It’s quiet and safe neighborhood.
space: House location is close to the T(train/subway) station “Sullivan Suqare” on orange line around 10 mins walking distance. It’s close to Downtown, MIT, Harvard, Tufts University. Extra service: We provide picking up service from Logan airport(Ask about it, depends on time. It charges extra service fee).
description: Do you wish to stay in a comfy&economic private room near Cambridge? It’s historical and convenient location to stay in the house. You could find small market, restaurants, bars, grocery store, laundry store nearby the house in a few blocks away. It’s quiet and safe neighborhood. House location is close to the T(train/subway) station “Sullivan Suqare” on orange line around 10 mins walking distance. It’s close to Downtown, MIT, Harvard, Tufts University. Extra service: We provide picking up service from Logan airport(Ask about it, depends on time. It charges extra service fee). You will have one private bedroom with lock on the door.  Other space like kitchen, bathroom, living room are shared with other guests and please don't put your personal items there. You can choose one area in refrigerator but please don't touch others’ items. To Sullivan Square T station on orange line:  - 10 mins walking. To Downtown/South Station:  - 10-15 mins by T. To Harvard, MIT:  - 5-10 mins by car.  - or
notes: Boston is the city that has lots of historical buildings and old houses. My house is one of them. It's an old house so there would have some old part/small damaged part, but it is clean and good to use. We hired professional housekeeper to do the cleaning. If you have concern, please contact host first.
transit: To Sullivan Square T station on orange line:  - 10 mins walking. To Downtown/South Station:  - 10-15 mins by T. To Harvard, MIT:  - 5-10 mins by car.  - or 15-20 mins by public transportation. The time shows above is average approximant time. It might have some changes depends on T line management or traffic impact. Parking situation: Street parking. We don’t provide guarantee parking space and guests shall follow street rules on street side since it’s street parking. We have limited parking permits for guests use. It’s free to use parking permit if we have available one but guest need to contact host to use it and shall return it back before check out. Otherwise, there will be penalty fee charges($100).
access: You will have one private bedroom with lock on the door.  Other space like kitchen, bathroom, living room are shared with other guests and please don't put your personal items there. You can choose one area in refrigerator but please don't touch others’ items.
house_rules: We charge security deposit fee if guests break house rule. Reservation has possible to be canceled if break rules. Refund of cancellation will depends on cancel policy. House rule: 1. Guest has responsible to read my instruction carefully and check in to correct room. Don't take wrong key; don't enter wrong room; don't stay in wrong room.   2. Party, event, loud music are not allowed in our apartment.  Quiet time: 10pm ~ 8am. Do not disturb neighbors. 3. Smoking and drug using are strictly prohibited inside the apartment, in apartment hallway and near the front entrance stairs. 4. No extra person stay in the apartment except those listed in your group when you placed booking. No extra person stay overnight. 5. Please don't throw trash or trash bags outside the house, not even in the bin. Contact me to collect trash bags. There're special rule on street. 6. Please wash your used dishes, glasses, pots and pans immediately after you use. 7. Please don't put your private stuff everywhere i
host_about: Undergraduate student in Umass Boston. I came from Chongqing, China. Would like to welcome friendly guests from all around the world.

name: Bright & Modern w/ Free Laundry, WiFi, & Cleaning!
summary: This is a 3 story 6 unit Victorian style building in East Somerville. Noted for its high walkability score, East Somerville is a favorite of college students, researchers, and young professionals. The commute to Harvard, Tufts, and MIT is less than half an hour. NOTE: This unit is professionally managed by Bedly, a furnished housing provider. Bedding, pillows, towels, & toiletries are NOT provided, so please plan accordingly.
space: This room is a part of Bedly, a furnished housing community. This space is professionally managed and the Bedly customer support team is available 7 days a week from 9am to 9pm. You will receive full contact information when your reservation is accepted. This is a co-living space and other Bedly residents currently live in other rooms in this unit. -Free Cleaning (2x Monthly) -Utilities Included -High-Speed WiFi -Customer Support Team All Bedly guests must complete and clear a background check online (free of charge) after their reservation is accepted. We will also collect your contact information so that we can keep you updated about important information regarding your Bedly living space.
